name: Toon War
description: ToonWar is a twin stick shooter game with colorful graphics. Your mission is to liberate peaceful villages from evil forces, eliminate enemies and win over dangerous bosses.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Card Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Core 2 duo Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Non integrated graphics card Storage: 2 GB available space
